## hslToRgb() function

Converts an HSL color to RGB color space.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function hslToRgb(hsl: HSL): RGB;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

hsl


</td><td>

[HSL](./chromaterm.hsl.md)


</td><td>

HSL color with h: 0-360, s: 0-1, l: 0-1


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[RGB](./chromaterm.rgb.md)

RGB color with values 0-255 (rounded to nearest integer)
